html:
Nov 22 (Reuters) - Obama Foundation

  • THE OBAMA FOUNDATION ANNOUNCED JEFF BEZOS IS GIVING $100 MILLION IN HONOR OF CONGRESSMAN JOHN LEWIS

  • THE OBAMA FOUNDATION ANNOUNCED BEZOS HAS ASKED FOR THE PLAZA AT THE OBAMA PRESIDENTIAL CENTER TO BE NAMED THE JOHN LEWIS PLAZA

Source text: https://www.obama.org/updates/bezos-donation-2021/

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
